# `getAuthenticationStatus()`

Use `getAuthenticationStatus` to get the authentication status of the user.

```ts
const { isAuthenticated, isLoading } = auth.getAuthenticationStatus()

if (isLoading) {
  console.log('Loading...')
}

if (isAuthenticated) {
  console.log('User is authenticated')
}
```
